thread.section_title: Dillengerelectricbikes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dillengerelectricbikes | dillengerelectricbikes.com.au
thread.title: Peter Wiltshire

author: Peter Wiltshire
title: Peter Wiltshire
text:
If you are thinking of upgrading or just simply going for the ready to ride bikes on offer, then dillenger electric bikes are there at the top. They have a wide range of products for everyone. I have the street legal kit that I have had for several months now, this kit performs flawlessly, is super easy to install and will take you anywhere with minimal effort from the rider. Dillenger also have a exellent attitude when it comes to customer service and support. The rapid response time via email is fast. You will not be left days Waiting to hear from them. I live in Darwin NT and even the courier service used to ship goods is so quick I had my kit in 6 days.
If you are thinking of going ebike the n give these guys a go. You will not be dissapointed.
A massive shout out to Iris from dillenger, on the phone or email a complete professional, she really knows what she's talking about when dealing with her. So thankyou iris and the whole team at dillenger electric bikes.
Cheers guys. Pete.
